root.server

Class AES_Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • root.server.AES_Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AES_Server
extends AbstractServer
    This Class is implements the server side The class extends the AbstractServer class Super class is implemented all the connection methods The connection with the server is used with message class.
